title: Double Denim Delight for Alpecin-Deceuninck with ‘Daring’ 2024 Kits
content:
'Because jeans are great for any occasion, no?' asks Belgian team in launch of wild new Kalas-created uniform.

Read the full article at Double Denim Delight for Alpecin-Deceuninck with ‘Daring’ 2024 Kits on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
